text: Oh good point, we should be updating some of these examples to use JLD2.jl if possible. I think the only limitations are with respect to what you can save? I (so far) only save numeric data so I don't have any problem. Perhaps there are some limitations with saving things like closures. Maybe <@U9769MVA7> can point you to a document that compares the two

text:
I am not aware of any such comparison.

As far as I can tell, a lot of the serialization packages (e.g. JLD2, JLD, BSON)
had a lack maintenance for too long..

text: very true, i was _really mad_ at the state of saving data with Julia during the last year of my phd
